content.html: + on top of those four distinct parts: Authoring should have a standardized server API (Micropub) to enable interchangeable clients Consumption should have a standardized server API (Microsub) to enable interchangeable readers Comments should be self-hosted through Webmention
content.value:
+ on top of those four distinct parts:

Authoring should have a standardized server API (Micropub) to enable interchangeable clients

Consumption should have a standardized server API (Microsub) to enable interchangeable readers

Comments should be self-hosted through Webmention
